body_html:
@pjh5, @zou3519

I ran python char_rnn.py --gpu -- train_data /path/to/shakespeare.txt
I get an error:

Entering interactive debugger. Type "bt" to print the full stacktrace. Type "help" to see command listing.
[enforce fail at common_cudnn.h:102] version_match. cuDNN compiled (7102) and runtime (7005) versions mismatch

When I run cat /usr/local/cuda/include/cudnn.h | grep CUDNN_MAJOR -A 2
#define CUDNN_MAJOR 7
#define CUDNN_MINOR 0
#define CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 4

so I am confused : I have cuDNN 704 according to cudnn.h
caffe2 example char_rnn sees cuDNN runtime of 7005 and it is compiled with cuDNN 7102

Can you help?
Update
In ananconda3/envs/caffe35/lib I found libcudnn.so.7.0.5 (which I renamed to take it out of the equation)
As a result the error now is:
Entering interactive debugger. Type "bt" to print the full stacktrace. Type "help" to see command listing.
[enforce fail at common_cudnn.h:102] version_match. cuDNN compiled (7102) and runtime (7004) versions mismatch
So last part of the mystery to be solved is where does cuDNN version 7102 come from

body:
@pjh5, @zou3519 

I ran **python char_rnn.py --gpu -- train_data /path/to/shakespeare.txt**
I get an error:

Entering interactive debugger. Type "bt" to print the full stacktrace. Type "help" to see command listing.
[enforce fail at common_cudnn.h:102] version_match. cuDNN compiled (7102) and runtime (7005) versions mismatch 


When I run **cat /usr/local/cuda/include/cudnn.h | grep CUDNN_MAJOR -A 2**
#define CUDNN_MAJOR 7
#define CUDNN_MINOR 0
#define CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 4

so I am confused : I have cuDNN 704 according to cudnn.h
caffe2 example char_rnn sees cuDNN runtime of 7005 and it is compiled with cuDNN 7102

Can you help?
**Update**
In ananconda3/envs/caffe35/lib I found libcudnn.so.7.0.5 (which I renamed to take it out of the equation)
As a result the error now is:
Entering interactive debugger. Type "bt" to print the full stacktrace. Type "help" to see command listing.
[enforce fail at common_cudnn.h:102] version_match. cuDNN compiled (7102) and **runtime (7004)** versions mismatch 
So last part of the mystery to be solved is where does cuDNN version 7102 come from
